title: Calculator
description: This is a simple calculator that can be used to calculate simple mathematics.

title: Weather App
description: This Weather Website is a user-friendly platform that leverages the OpenWeatherMap API to provide real-time weather information for various cities worldwide. Users can easily access current weather conditions, and detailed information for any desired location.

images.alt: screenshoot of my project named Weather app

title: Movie Showcasing
description: This project showcases a sleek and interactive landing page for movie enthusiasts. With a focus on user experience, we've crafted a dynamic layout using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to display a banner featuring some of the movies along with some information.

images.alt: screenshoot of my project named Movie Showcasing

title: Shipping WebApp
description: This shipping website is designed to facilitate services provided by the company. It has been developed using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and JavaScript, emphasizing responsiveness and simplicity.

images.alt: screenshoot of my project named Shipping WebApp

title: Ecommerce Webapp
description: This Ecommerce website is designed to facilitate product viewing, multipage navigation, order placement, and cart functionality. It has been developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, emphasizing responsiveness and simplicity.

images.alt: screenshoot of my project named Ecommerce Webapp

title: Signup Form Webapp
description: This is a simple React web application that demonstrates user authentication using Firebase Authentication. Users can sign up, log in, change their profile picture, and log out.

images.alt: screenshoot of my project named Signup Form Webapp

title: Facebook Clone
description: The Facebook Clone project is a web application created using the React.js library and integrated with Firebase services. Its purpose is to mimic the fundamental features of Facebook, allowing users to create profiles, like, comment and share on posts, interact with other users, and experience a real-time social networking environment.

images.alt: screenshoot of my project named Facebook Clone
